description.narrative: The goal of the Community Resilience Activity (CRA) is to increase stability in focus areas of Pakistan through increasing resilience in targeted communities vulnerable to violent extremism. USAID proposed two underlying programmatic objectives to achieve this goal: 1) Increase broad-based citizen engagement in community decision-making; and, 2) Enhance tolerance within and across communities.
